TopicTitle: KSM - Kerbal Space Manager (KerbalStuff.com Mod Manager)

Articles.Content:
I have created a very simple mod manager that uses KerbalStuff.com

It automatically keeps all plugins installed through KSM up to date.

I will create a GitHub for the project if there is interest.

Mod edit: Link zapped!

Edited January 16, 2015 by technicalfool

Hi there.

That does look like an interesting tool. However, we do need you to make the source available (perhaps via Github) and to specify a license (again, perhaps via Github) before advertising it here.

I'll give you a day to get that sorted out. Good luck with the project.
